title: Spiced coffee cake
ingredients: ['300g butter', '5 eggs', '250g caster sugar', '2 1/2 teaspoons vanilla sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 pinch freshly ground nutmeg', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder', '150g ground almonds or nuts of choice', '300g plain flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '250ml strong brewed coffee', 'To decorate', 'chocolate icing', '2 tablespoons sliced almonds']
